mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title name, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN 'new-state-point' WHEN '2' THEN 'up-state-point' WHEN '3' THEN 'down-state-point' END stateColor FROM app_workbench_page a WHERE a.type = 1 AND a.state != 4 ORDER BY a.order_by ASC
SELECT a.order_by orderBy FROM app_workbench_page a WHERE a.type = 1 ORDER BY a.order_by DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.order_by orderBy FROM app_workbench_page a WHERE a.type = 2 AND a.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY a.order_by DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_workbench_page (id, title, logo, url, url_type, state, order_by, type, parent_id, create_id, create_time, last_update_id, last_update_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{logo}, #{url}, #{urlType}, #{state}, #{orderBy}, #{type}, #{parentId}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateId}, #{lastUpdateTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.state, a.logo, a.url, a.parent_id parentId, a.order_by orderBy, b.user_name createId, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime FROM app_workbench_page a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id WHERE a.type = 2 AND a.parent_id = #{chooseId} AND a.state != 4
AND a.title LIKE '%${title}%'
ORDER BY a.order_by ASC
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.url_type urlType, a.state, a.logo, a.url, a.parent_id parentId FROM app_workbench_page a WHERE a.id = #{id}
